remarks: Two translations agree at any atom not under the fiducial co-atom ` W ` iff they are equal.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-2013.)
statement:
cdlemd.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemd.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemd.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemd.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrneq3 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( F ` P ) = ( G ` P ) <-> F = G ) ) $.
